name: Shipwrecked Space Scoundrel
description:
Shipwrecked Space Scoundrel

Game for the GitHub game jam "Game Off 2018", theme Hybrid. Hero of the game is a biomechanic (part living, part machine) space raccoon. You may find other smaller incorporations of the theme.

Things you should know:

  • Controls: ArrowKeys, Jump=X/Y, Action=X/H
  • Lose condition is not implemented. It's an experience ;)
  • HTML version should work only in Chromium / Firefox
  • One of our team has reported major audio glitching on mac, sorry :(
  • Game is about 60 MB, please be patient when loading...
  • Game has a fixed resolution of 1024 x 768
  • The downloadable versions may be more performant than the embedded version on this page. They're exports with Godot's default settings :)

Code and project lead: northburns
Art: iirouse
Sounds: efunkelist

Some resources licensed from Kenney, Game-Icons.net, and Pexels. More thorough credits, license information, and social media links over at our GitHub repo: 

https://github.com/northburns/redesigned-pancake
